title: The Quantum Cartographers

  "concept": "In a near-future research facility, a brilliant but socially awkward young physicist named Alex Chen develops revolutionary 'quantum cartography' technology that can map and eventually create portals to alternate Earths across the multiverse. When Alex and a diverse team of young scientists begin exploring these parallel worlds, they discover a disturbing pattern: someone or something is methodically destroying alternate Earths, leaving behind distinctive energy signatures. As the destruction pattern approaches their own reality, the team must navigate complex multiverse politics, confront ethical dilemmas about interfering in other realities, and race to identify the destroyer before their Earth becomes the next target. Their journey challenges not only their understanding of physics but also their definitions of humanity, choice, and responsibility across infinite possibilities.",
